Atena..."},{"lineNumber":87672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自分で選ぶ、れすか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"have to choose for myself...?\""},{"lineNumber":87673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あてな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Atena.\""},{"lineNumber":87674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………あてなは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........Atena is...\""},{"lineNumber":87675,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......."},{"lineNumber":87676,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":87677,"originalJapaneseLine":"それから長い……","translatedEnglishLine":"And then, a long time passed..."},{"lineNumber":87678,"originalJapaneseLine":"とても長い年月が流れた……","translatedEnglishLine":"A very long stretch of years flowed by..."},{"lineNumber":87679,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界の文明が一度滅び……","translatedEnglishLine":"The world's civilization once perished..."},{"lineNumber":87680,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてまた新しく生まれる……","translatedEnglishLine":"And was born anew again..."},{"lineNumber":87681,"originalJapaneseLine":"それほどの年月が……","translatedEnglishLine":"That much time..."},{"lineNumber":87682,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":87683,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":87684,"originalJapaneseLine":"とある村――","translatedEnglishLine":"In a certain village—"},{"lineNumber":87685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おつかい行ってきましたでございますれす」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I've returned from my errand, Atena.\""},{"lineNumber":87686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おお、ありがとう、あてな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, thank you, Atena."},{"lineNumber":87687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　助かるよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've been a big help.\""},{"lineNumber":87688,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、わ、なんだ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh? W-Wha—what is this!?\""},{"lineNumber":87689,"originalJapaneseLine":"とても人間には持てないような量の薪を","translatedEnglishLine":"A huge load of firewood, far more than a normal human could carry,"},{"lineNumber":87690,"originalJapaneseLine":"あてなが軽々と宿屋の前に置いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Atena lightly placed it in front of the inn."},{"lineNumber":87691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、あてなは祭りの準備がありますので、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, Atena has preparations for the festival,"},{"lineNumber":87692,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これで失礼させて頂きますれす」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I will take my leave now.\""},{"lineNumber":87693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいよー、いつもありがとう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alrighty, thank you as always.\""},{"lineNumber":87694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おい、ありゃあなんだい？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Hey, what the heck is that?"},{"lineNumber":87695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見た感じ人間じゃなさそうだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It doesn't look like a human..."},{"lineNumber":87696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔物？　天使様？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A monster? An angel?"},{"lineNumber":87697,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それとも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or perhaps...\""},{"lineNumber":87698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあなあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who knows...\""},{"lineNumber":87699,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故かずっと昔からこの村を守ってくれてる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For some reason, she has been protecting this village since long ago."},{"lineNumber":87700,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の爺ちゃんの爺ちゃんの爺ちゃんの、","translatedEnglishLine":"My grandpa's grandpa's grandpa,"},{"lineNumber":87701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのまたずーっと爺ちゃんの代からな」","translatedEnglishLine":"and even long before his generation.\""},{"lineNumber":87702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃまた何故？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why is that, then?\""},{"lineNumber":87703,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分からん。あてなも覚えてないそうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know. Atena herself doesn't remember either.\""},{"lineNumber":87704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、俺達は彼女を、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But we call her,"},{"lineNumber":87705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感謝と親しみを込めて守り神様と呼んでる」","translatedEnglishLine":"with gratitude and affection, our guardian deity.\""},{"lineNumber":87706,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうかい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see..."},{"lineNumber":87707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世の中には不思議なこともあるもんだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"There are mysterious things in this world after all...\""},{"lineNumber":87708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それより旅人のお客人、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyway, traveler guest,"},{"lineNumber":87709,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんた運がいい、来週は祭りがあるんだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"you’re lucky, next week there's a festival."},{"lineNumber":87710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへっ、ここは歌って踊れる楽しい村。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, this is a village where you can sing and dance happily."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あてな、この村にいたらいけないれすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do I, Atena, not belong in this village?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさか。そんなことないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No way. That's not true at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人もみんな、あてなのことは好きだもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone in the village likes you, Atena."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、でもね……
近頃、よく思うの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've been thinking a lot lately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私がいなくなった後、
貴方はどうするのかしらって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what will you do, I wonder...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろんこの村にいてくれてもいいけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, you can stay in this village if you want, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元いた場所に帰る努力をしても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it might be good to try to return to where you originally came from...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいんじゃないかしらって……」
「貴方が元いた世界の人達は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The people in the world you came from,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が貴方を奪って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: might be troubled because I took you away...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困っているんじゃないかしら、そう思うの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think that might be the case..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この村に残るか……
この村を出て元いた場所に帰るか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or leave this village and return to where you originally came from...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選んで欲しいの……」
「アテナはどうした方がいいと思いますれすか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Atena, what do you think you should do?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅん、駄目よ。
それは貴方が自分で選ぶの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's something you have to decide for yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あてな……あてな、が……
自分で選ぶ、れすか……？」
「……あてな」
それから長い……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And then, a long time passed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とても長い年月が流れた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A very long stretch of years flowed by...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の文明が一度滅び……
そしてまた新しく生まれる……
それほどの年月が……
とある村――
「おつかい行ってきましたでございますれす」
「おお、ありがとう、あてな。
助かるよ」
「えっ、わ、なんだ！？」
とても人間には持てないような量の薪を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge load of firewood, far more than a normal human could carry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あてなが軽々と宿屋の前に置いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atena lightly placed it in front of the inn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、あてなは祭りの準備がありますので、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, Atena has preparations for the festival,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで失礼させて頂きますれす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I will take my leave now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいよー、いつもありがとう」
「お、おい、ありゃあなんだい？
見た感じ人間じゃなさそうだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It doesn't look like a human...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物？　天使様？
それとも……」
「さあなあ……」
「何故かずっと昔からこの村を守ってくれてる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For some reason, she has been protecting this village since long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の爺ちゃんの爺ちゃんの爺ちゃんの、
そのまたずーっと爺ちゃんの代からな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and even long before his generation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そりゃまた何故？」
「分からん。あてなも覚えてないそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know. Atena herself doesn't remember either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、俺達は彼女を、
感謝と親しみを込めて守り神様と呼んでる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with gratitude and affection, our guardian deity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうかい……
世の中には不思議なこともあるもんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are mysterious things in this world after all..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それより旅人のお客人、
あんた運がいい、来週は祭りがあるんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you’re lucky, next week there's a festival.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ、ここは歌って踊れる楽しい村。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, this is a village where you can sing and dance happily.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
